section.name: Getting Started - Jetty
section.p:
Either:
download a copy of Jetty 5+ - unpack it somewhere
set JETTY5_HOME to this directory and export it
Or:
download a copy of Jetty 6+ - unpack it somewhere
set JETTY6_HOME to this directory and export it
Finally, to start the node :
from $WADI_HOME/bin run e.g. './node.sh jetty5 red' or './node.sh jetty6 red'
